variable.saved: Variable with RDC-ID {{ id }} was saved successfully!
variable.not-saved: Variable with RDC-ID {{ id }} has not been saved!
variable.missing-id: Variable {{ index }} does not contain a RDC-ID and has not been saved:
variable.upload-terminated: Finished upload of {{ total }} Variables with {{ errors }} errors.

detail.title: Variable Details
detail.not-found: The {{id}} references to an unknown Variable.

valid-responses.unique-value: The value has to be unique within the valid responses.

total-absolute-frequency.not-null: The total absolute frequency must not be empty!

total-valid-absolute-frequency.not-null: The total valid absolute frequency must not be empty!

total-valid-relative-frequency.not-null: The total valid relative frequency must not be empty!

missings.uniqueCode: The code has to be unique within the missings.

expression.not-empty: The filter expression must not be empty!
expression.size: The max length of the filter expression is 128 signs.

description.i18n-string-size: The max length of the filter description is 2048 signs.

expression-language.not-empty: The filter expression language  must not be empty!
expression-language.valid-filter-expression-language: The filter expression language is not valid. Valid is: SpEL and Stata.

generation-details.not-empty-generation-details-description: The rule or the description of a generation rule must not be empty! Both can be set, too.
generation-details.rule-expression-language-and-rule-filled: Both, the rule and the rule expression language, have to be filled or empty.

description.i18n-string-size: The max length of the generation rule description of the variable is 2048 signs.

rule.size: The max length of the rule is 1048576 signs.

rule-expression-language.valid-rule-expression-language: The rule expression language is not valid. Valid is: R and Stata.

code.not-null: The code of a missing must be not empty!

label.i18n-string-size: The max length of the label of a missing is 128 signs.

absolute-frequency.not-null: The absolute frequency of a missing must not be empty!

relative-frequency.not-null: The relative frequency of a missing must not be empty!

label.i18n-string-size: The max length of the label of a valid response is 2048 signs.

absolute-frequency.not-null: The absolute frequency of a valid response must not be empty!

relative-frequency.not-null: The relative frequency of a valid response must not be empty!

value.size: The max length of the value of a valid response is 32 signs.
value.not-null: The value of a valid response must not be empty!

valid-relative-frequency.not-null: The valid relative frequency of a valid response must not be empty!

variable.valid-variable-name: The RDC-ID of the Variable is not valid for the Pattern: RDCID-VariableName.
variable.unique-variable-name-in-project: The name of the Variable is already used within this Project.
variable.mandatory-scale-level-for-numeric-data-t: The Scale Level of a numeric Variable must not be empty or is must be empty on a string data type!
variable.valid-response-value-must-be-a-number-on: If the variable has a numeric data type, the values of valid responses have to be numeric!
variable.valid-response-value-must-be-an-iso-date: If the variable has a date data type, the values of valid responses have to be matchable by the ISO Standard 8601.

id.not-empty: The RDC-ID of the Variable must not be empty!
id.size: The max length of the RDC-ID is 128 signs.
id.pattern: Use only alphanumeric signs, german umlauts, ÃŸ and space, underscore and minus for the RDC-ID.

data-type.not-null: The data type of the Variable must not be empty!
data-type.valid-data-type: The value for data type is not valid. Allowed values in english: string, numerisch. Allowed values in english: string, numeric.
data-type.valid-scale-level: The values for Scale Level are not valid. Allowed values in german: ordinal, nominal, kontinuierlich. Allowed values in english: ordinal, nominal, continous.

name.not-empty: The Name of the Variable must not be empty!
name.size: The max length of the name is 32 signs.
name.pattern: Use only alphanumeric signs and underscore for the name.

label.not-null: The label of the Variable must not be empty!
label.i18n-string-size: The max length of the label is 128 signs.
label.i18n-string-not-empty: At least an english or a german label must be given!

description.i18n-string-size: The max length of the description is 2048 signs.

access-ways.not-empty: The list of access ways of a variable needs min. one element and must not be empty!
access-ways.valid-access-ways: The values of access ways are invalid. Valid values are: suf, cuf and remote.

ids.not-empty: The Variable must be assigned to at least one Data Set!
The Variable must be assigned to at least one Survey!

post-validation.variable-has-invalid-survey-id: The Variable {{id}} references to an unknown Survey ({{toBereferenzedId}}).
post-validation.variable-has-invalid-data-set-id: The Variable {{id}} references to an unknown Data Set ({{toBereferenzedId}}).
post-validation.variable-id-is-not-in-invalid-variables-: The Variable {{id}} references to an unknown Panel Variable ({{toBereferenzedId}}).
post-validation.variable-has-invalid-question-id: The Variable {{id}} references to an unknown Question ({{toBereferenzedId}}).
